Rooms

Standard Room
80.00$

A comfortable and cozy room perfect for solo travelers or couples. Equipped with a double bed, a desk, and a private bathroom, the Standard Room offers everything you need for a good night's rest.

Reservation
Deluxe Suite
200.00$

Experience luxury at its finest in our Deluxe Suite. This spacious room features a king-size bed, a separate living area with a sofa and armchairs, and a Jacuzzi tub. Perfect for couples or small families.

Reservation
Executive Room
120.00$

The Executive Room offers modern furnishings and a sophisticated ambiance, perfect for business travelers. This room features a queen-size bed, a work desk, and a private bathroom.

Reservation
Family Room
150.00$

Travelling with the family? Our Family Room offers two double beds, a TV, and a private bathroom. This room is perfect for families with children.

Reservation
Honeymoon Suite
300.00$

Celebrate your love in our Honeymoon Suite, featuring a king-size bed, a private balcony with a romantic view, a Jacuzzi tub, and champagne on arrival.

Reservation
Penthouse Suite
400.00$

Indulge in the ultimate luxury experience in our Penthouse Suite. This spacious and stylish suite features a king-size bed, a separate living area, a private balcony with a stunning city view, and a hot tub.

Reservation
